short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out the keyCode (also known as charCode) of a pressed key. Keylogger

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Find out the keyCode (also known as charCode) of a pressed key. 

This extension is open source and can be viewed on Github at - https://github.com/mikethedj4/KeyCodez---Chrome-Extension
